title: Toaster?
body:
Well even since you started League you have probably heard the occasional word you don't know. Whether it would be ''Hey guys build 
**mr**'' or ''You people should **mia** more often''. Theirs always a word that may pop up and recently I have been hearing the word ''toaster''?!? I heard this in a game of URF when someone said something about Jinx's toaster?!? Or it meaning something in computer context? I have a good feeling this actually means nothing but i want to ask you guys.

replies.body: Anything refering to Toasters/Hamsters especially early on in the game, generally is refering to someone's load time's, which is a symptom of a shitty computer.
Yeah thanks guys, this was exactly what i was looking for.
Must be new to the internet to not know what a toaster means lol, but as others said toaster= shit computer.

I believe when someone is referring to toaster (Previous experience) It's referring to how they take for ever to load in loading screens...
E.G "Omg Nasus stop using a toaster as a modem"
--- 
Don't know if this is what you're after
